page.title: 12TRAFFIC IN BENTHAM
page.content: We compared traffic in Bentham on a market day with a quiet day (Thursday). Surprisingly there were less cars in the town centre on a Wednesday (296 as compared with 393), and fewer lorries (84 to 104). We think motorists avoid the town centre because of congestion. The only category to increase on a market day were tractors.{Trains}run daily from Leeds to Morecambe. 5 stop on a weekday and 3 on a Sunday on the down line. 6 during the week and 3 on a Sunday on the up line. {Buses.}The Pennine and Ribble Bus Companies run a daily service between Lancaster and Skipton. Lancaster-Skipton 15 daily 5 Sunday Skipton-Lancaster 14 daily 5 Sunday
